Test Name: FBN1 Full Gene Sequencing with Deletion/Duplication Analysis
Purpose: To identify pathogenic FBN1 gene mutations (including large deletions/duplications) associated with Marfan syndrome and related connective tissue disorders.
Equipment: Thermocycler, DNA sequencing platform (Sanger or NGS), Qubit fluorometer, Magnetic bead-based purification system, Gel electrophoresis system
